name: Unlimited lifetime magic links
description: Create as many magic links as you want, without any limit.

name: Unlimited redirect changes
description: Change where your magic links redirect to as many times as you want, without any limit.

name: Variable passing
description: Any variable appended to the magic link will be automatically passed on when clicked.

name: Track where link is used
description: Add 'sources' to your links to remember where they are used. Places can be physical and virtual. We'll also automatically add sources when we find them.

name: Unlimited team members
description: Add as many team members as you need

name: Magic link analytics
description: Track how many times your magic link was interacted with

name: QR Code
description: Get a free QR code with each free magic link

name: No ads during redirects
description: Show no ads to your users during the redirect

name: Multiple team member permission levels
description: Each team member can have their own permission level

name: Two Factor Authentication (2FA)
description: Add a second factor to your account to protect your account from being hacked

name: API access
description: Access, build, and update your magic links through our API

name: Dynamic variables in destinations
description: Use rule values in your URLs to create dynamic destinations, for example: http://example.com/?date={Date}

name: Analytics central hub
description: See an overview of your magic link performance in the beautiful analytics dashboard

name: Unique click counts
description: Track how many unique people clicked on your dynamic magic link

name: Breakdown of where your clicks are coming from
description: See all the referrers of your clicks

name: Breakdown of most common countries your clicks come from
description: See all the countries your clicks occured in

name: See your best performing time of day
description: Get detailed charts showing you when your links are most clicked or scanned

name: Regular automatic destination checks
description: We'll check your destinations and run uptime-monitoring to regularly make sure that your magic links are working

name: Redirect to multiple destinations
description: Redirect to multiple destinations based on any rules you choose

name: Create any amount of destinations
description: Make unlimited amounts of smart destinations per each magic link you define

name: Redirect based on the time of day
description: Rules based redirects

name: Redirect based on the users country
description: Rules based redirects

name: Run A/B tests by redirecting a subset of users to different destinations
description: Rules based redirects

name: Redirect based on the users language
description: Rules based redirects

name: Redirect based on the date
description: Rules based redirects

name: Redirect based on the users IP address
description: Rules based redirects

name: Redirect based on the variables in the link
description: Rules based redirects

name: Redirect based on where the user came from
description: Rules based redirects

name: Redirect based on the user-agent of the browser
description: Rules based redirects

name: Other rules based magic redirects
description: Rules based redirects
